definition: to wipe/to erase/rubbing (brush stroke in painting)/to clean/to polish
one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing heaven/male principle/☰/ancient Chinese compass point: 315° (northwest)

sentences.english: I dried myself with a handkerchief.
sentences.chinese: 我自己拿手巾擦乾了臉。

sentences.english: That wiped away tears for you, is the last person you spend.
sentences.chinese: 那個爲你擦乾眼淚的，纔是最後和你相守的人。

sentences.english: She picks up a dishtowel and begins drying the dishes.
sentences.chinese: 她拿起洗碟布並開始把盤子擦乾。

sentences.english: Wipe away tears, we have nothing to do but adamancy.
sentences.chinese: 擦乾眼淚，除了堅強我們別無選擇。

sentences.english: I need some paper to dry the coffee spill.
sentences.chinese: 我需要一些紙把濺灑出來的咖啡潰擦乾。

sentences.english: Before applying Mepiform make sure the scar area and surrounding skin are clean and dry.
sentences.chinese: 使用前瘢痕和周圍的皮膚要洗淨擦乾。

sentences.english: You won't mind using them to dry off or tossing them onto the floor for cleanups .
sentences.chinese: 你不會介意把它們用作擦乾東西或清洗地板。

sentences.english: If you use a bit of elbow grease you'll get the floor clean.
sentences.chinese: 你只要用點勁，就能把地板擦乾淨。

sentences.english: The road zigzagged into the distance, wiping the tears, you continued your journey.
sentences.chinese: 道路蜿蜒通向遠方，擦乾淚水，你繼續你的旅程。

sentences.english: Helpers, please clean up the table.
sentences.chinese: 值日生，請把桌子擦乾淨。

sentences.english: You see, you washed the car, but left the windows unclean.
sentences.chinese: 你看，你洗了汽車，但是沒有把窗子擦乾淨。

sentences.english: Wipe your feet well, or you will track up my new rug.
sentences.chinese: 把腳擦乾淨，要不就會踩髒我的新地毯。

sentences.english: If Mr. Pliner's shoes do get wet, he immediately tries to dry them with paper towels.
sentences.chinese: 如果靴子弄溼了，普利鈉會馬上用紙巾把靴子擦乾。

sentences.english: Once in a while the sticky sauce pan is thoroughly scraped out.
sentences.chinese: 只一會就把這個粘糊糊的鍋擦乾淨了。

sentences.english: You'd better rub him down with a dry towel.Otherwise he'll catch cold.
sentences.chinese: 你最好用乾毛巾給他擦乾，否則他會感冒的。
